content: chain fasten_off leaving long yarn tail for sewing sew ears to head and weave in ends jersey wooly a fairly new breed the jersey wooly is a fairly small rabbit with a docile nature and an easy care coat there are many colour variations but the sample is made in charcoal and silver head and body rounds 1-4 i​ n charcoal follow pattern for european rabbit round 5 ​10sc in charcoal increase single_crochet increase in silver 15 stitches round 6 ​10sc in charcoal increase 2sc increase single_crochet in silver 17 stitches round 7 ​11sc in silver b s in charcoal 2sc in silver © laura s pixie patch 11 b s in charcoal 2sc in silver 17 stitches rounds 8-17 c​ ontinue in silver following the european rabbit pattern make the back legs and tail using the european rabbit pattern in charcoal ears make 2 chain 3 single_crochet in second chain from hook single_crochet double_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in back bump of second chain from hook double_crochet single_crochet all in last chain single_crochet in back of starting chain pinch the sides of the base of the ear together and sew on to the head make it fluffy cut lengths of silver yarn and pull loops through the stitches on the rabbit s body using your crochet hook put the ends through the loop to knot and pull tight continue until you have covered the rabbit s body separate the strands using your yarn needle and use your wire brush to fluff up the yarn trim in to shape netherland dwarf the netherland dwarf is a small and popular rabbit breed use the european rabbit pattern for the head body legs and tail in the colour of your choice ears make 2 chain 3 single_crochet in second chain from hook single_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in back bump of second chain from hook single_crochet in last chain single_crochet in back of starting chain fasten_off leaving yarn tail for sewing pinch the sides of the base of the ear together and sew onto head © laura s pixie patch 12 lionhead the lionhead is one of the most recent rabbit breeds with a characteristic mane which may be single where they carry only one copy of the mane gene or double where they have two double maned lionheads may also have a skirt lionheads have compact upright ears to make a lionhead rabbit use the european rabbit pattern for the head body legs and tail in the colour of your choice cut lengths of yarn in the same colour and pull loops through the stitches on the head and cheeks pull the ends of the yarn lengths through the loop and pull tight fluff up using your wire brush and trim into shape ears make 2 chain 3 single_crochet in second chain from hook single_crochet double_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in back bump of second chain from hook double_crochet single_crochet all in last chain single_crochet in
